title: Help me Gragas mains!!!
body: So I just picked up Gragas and my first game I felt like the fat man himself, rolling up in tea fights and causing havoc with my ult. But I can't seem to land a good Q (exploding cask). Every time I let one out it seems like I have to explode it before it even really gets to ferment. I've tried the whole EQ combo thing as well, but it still doesn't seem like enough time. Thanks!!

replies.body: The cask is mainly used for the Slow effect not the damage itself (though a fermented cask is good for jungle clearing).  like Dediguise said its a "zoning tool".  Used to slow people who are trying to get onto your adc, or trying to run away from you. Gragas is literally a Bouncer at a bar. You are what prevents chaos in the clubs. lol

It's better to use the cask as a zoning tool. you place it in a position so that they have to choose between taking the damage and slow or going a route that benefits you. The more indecisive they are the longer the cask ferments.
